H0.text: The dotterel belongs to which family of birds. Oystercatcher

H1.text: The dotterel belongs to which family of birds. Sandpiper

H2.text: The dotterel belongs to which family of birds. Avocet

H3.text: The dotterel belongs to which family of birds. Plover

A4.text: The IOC recognizes these 69 species of plovers, dotterels, and lapwings in family Charadriidae.

A5.text: The bird family Charadriidae includes the plovers, dotterels, and lapwings.

A6.text: The family Charadriidae was introduced (as Charadriad√¶) by the English zoologist William Elford Leach in a guide to the contents of the British Museum published in 1820.

A7.text: The family Charadriidae includes the plovers, dotterels, and lapwings
